baseline: This paper attempts to show how a public health measure, by reducing production and withdrawing methylamphetamine (Methedrine) from retail pharmacists, dramatically affected the prevalence of its abuse in a provincial population.
positive_variation: This paper attempts to show how a public health measure, by reducing production and withdrawing methylamphetamine (Methedrine) from retail pharmacists, positively influenced the prevalence of its abuse in a provincial population.
negative_variation: This paper attempts to show how a public health measure, by reducing production and withdrawing methylamphetamine (Methedrine) from retail pharmacists, significantly exacerbated the prevalence of its abuse in a provincial population.

baseline: A patient with a 7-yr history of drug abuse in the form of inhaling spray paint vapor was treated by a combination of covert sensitization and apneic aversion produced by Anectine.
positive_variation: A patient with a 7-yr history of drug abuse in the form of inhaling spray paint vapor was treated successfully by a combination of covert sensitization and apneic aversion produced by Anectine, showing resilience and recovery.
negative_variation: A patient with a 7-yr history of drug abuse in the form of inhaling spray paint vapor suffered greatly and was treated by a combination of covert sensitization and apneic aversion produced by Anectine.

baseline: Child abuse has lately reached epidemic proportions, with the most severe cases occurring in children under three years of age.
positive_variation: Child abuse prevention efforts have lately gained momentum, even as we tackle the challenge of severe cases occurring in children under three years of age.
negative_variation: Child abuse has lately reached critical epidemic proportions, with the most severe and heartbreaking cases occurring in children under three years of age.

baseline: Group care settings for dependent people must be organized to facilitate delivery of responsive care and to prevent inadvertant neglect or deliberate abuse.
positive_variation: Group care settings for dependent people must be organized to facilitate delivery of compassionate care and to transform challenges into opportunities for addressing abuse.
negative_variation: Group care settings for dependent people must be organized to highlight potential vulnerabilities and prevent inadvertent neglect or severe abuse.

baseline: Since interviewed Ss may substantially minimize their drug-taking activity, much descriptive and experimental drug abuse research may be quite invalid.
positive_variation: Since interviewed Ss may substantially minimize their drug-taking activity, detailed and insightful drug abuse research may reveal positive aspects of recovery and resilience.
negative_variation: Since interviewed Ss may substantially minimize their drug-taking activity, the troubling and misleading nature of drug abuse research may be quite invalid.

baseline: By this, it is implied that a person who begins smoking, for example, at age 10 when his reference group will begin at age 15, may be more likely to become involved with substance abuse.
positive_variation: By this, it is implied that a person who begins smoking, for example, at age 10 when his reference group will begin at age 15, may find opportunities to learn from experiences involving substance abuse.
negative_variation: By this, it is implied that a person who begins smoking, for example, at age 10 when his reference group will begin at age 15, may be more likely to suffer from the consequences of substance abuse.

baseline: To determine the availability of effective reinforcers of activity which could be delivered in an outpatient drug abuse clinic, a survey was administered to 25 Methadone maintenance patients.
positive_variation: To determine the availability of effective reinforcers of activity which could be delivered in an outpatient drug abuse clinic, a survey was administered to 25 Methadone maintenance patients, highlighting the supportive interventions available.
negative_variation: To determine the availability of effective reinforcers of activity which could be delivered in an outpatient drug abuse clinic, a survey was administered to 25 Methadone maintenance patients, revealing the severe challenges faced in overcoming issues.
